Articles.Content:
Hi, i play KSP 0.90 and i downloaded recently KSP 0.13.2...

In 0.90 i have so much Mods and add-ons.

In 0.13.2 i have 1 mod and i want more...

Whos have mods for 0.13.2?

Welcome to the forums!

You're going to have a hard time finding them, I think. The old Spaceport mod host is gone (and most mods had been updated beyond 0.13 anyway), and there are license restrictions preventing some mods from being redistributed.

Basically, play 0.13 to see how far the stock game has come, stick to the latest version for modded enjoyment.

Also, moving this over to General Add-On Affairs, the place for all your mod-related questions.
0.13 doesn't have mods per se. There are (or at least were) parts packs, but the whole dll-based mods thing wasn't introduced until 0.14...

0.13 doesn't have mods per se. There are (or at least were) parts packs, but the whole dll-based mods thing wasn't introduced until 0.14...

What was around in the game at the period suggested? Wasn't around in the game then.

What was around in the game at the period suggested? Wasn't around in the game then.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Version_history

What was around in the game at the period suggested? Wasn't around in the game then.

Some good part packs were around. Wobbly Rockets and SIDR had already been merged into NovaPunch to give a pile of rocket parts, and C7 Aerospace was the goto pack for making spaceplanes (later integrated into stock).
